keyMoments.title: Mr. 2 Defeated by Sanji
keyMoments.description: Baroque Works Officer Agent Mr. 2 Bon Clay is defeated by Sanji, eliminating one of the organization's strongest fighters from the Arabasta conflict.
keyMoments.significance: Another major loss for Baroque Works as the Straw Hats systematically defeat their officer agents.

keyMoments.title: Crocodile Advances His Plan
keyMoments.description: The Baroque Works president arrives at the palace with King Cobra, bringing his scheme to its final stages.
keyMoments.significance: Crocodile moves to secure his ultimate goal regarding Pluton and the kingdom.

keyMoments.title: Mr. 1 and Miss Doublefinger Hunt Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: The remaining officer agents pursue Nami as part of their strategy to eliminate the Straw Hat Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Baroque Works' continued efforts to eliminate their enemies despite losing multiple agents.

statusHistory.status: Active - Losing members to Straw Hat Pirates

goals: Eliminate the Straw Hat Pirates and Princess Vivi

keyMoments.title: Sanji Defeats Another Baroque Works Officer
keyMoments.description: Sanji successfully defeats Mr. 2 Bon Clay, continuing the crew's mission to take down Baroque Works and save Arabasta.
keyMoments.significance: Another victory in the crew's battles across Alubarna, bringing them closer to stopping Crocodile.
